title: Shawl, ca. 1870
medium:
Medium: wool
Technique: printed on plain weave
description: A square shawl with a border of cone motifs enclosing flowers and geometrical forms. Yellow outlined in dark red and blue. In each corner of the center square is a cone motif with sprays of flowers. Background is tan. Long fringe all around.

tombstone.epitaph:
Shawl, ca. 1870.Medium: wool
Technique: printed on plain weave. 1944-78-1.
